title: Fiction
description: Fictional stories and novels that are not based on real events or people. May include sub-genres such as romance, mystery, and science fiction.

title: Non-fiction
description: Books that are based on real events or people, such as biographies, history books, and self-help books.

title: Children's
description: Books that are written for children, typically up to the age of 12. May include picture books, chapter books, and middle-grade novels.

title: Young Adult
description: Books that are written for teenagers, typically between the ages of 12 and 18. May include coming-of-age stories, dystopian novels, and fantasy series.

title: Science Fiction
description: Books that are set in a speculative future or in alternative realities, often featuring advanced technology and space exploration.

title: Fantasy
description: Books that feature magical or supernatural elements, such as wizards, dragons, and mythical creatures.

title: Romance
description: Books that focus on romantic relationships, often with a happy ending. May include sub-genres such as historical romance and contemporary romance.

title: Mystery
description: Books that involve a crime or puzzle that needs to be solved. May include sub-genres such as detective fiction and thrillers.

title: Horror
description: Books that are intended to scare or unsettle the reader, often featuring supernatural or macabre elements.

title: Poetry
description: Books that contain poems, which are often characterized by their use of language, rhythm, and imagery.
